name: climine
description: A lightweight web runtime that facilitates easy web development

scripts.build-win: npx esbuild ./ --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/climine.cjs && npx pkg dist/climine.cjs -t node18-win-x64 -o dist/climine.exe && del dist\climine.cjs
scripts.build: npx esbuild ./ --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/climine.cjs && echo/ && echo Climine built successfully, run 'node dist/climine.cjs' to start the runtime OR compile it to an executable with your preferred tool

author: Vishok Manikantan
